ids_info.name: breeding_blanket
ids_info.description: Description of the breeding blanket and neutron shield (if any, the shield is considered as an additional layer of a given blanket module)

breeding_blanket/module.documentation: Set of modules composing the blanket. Within breeding_blanket IDS: Description of the breeding blanket and neutron shield (if any, the shield is considered as an additional layer of a given blanket module).

breeding_blanket/module/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within breeding_blanket IDS: Description of the breeding blanket and neutron shield (if any, the shield is considered as an additional layer of a given blanket module). Within module container: Set of modules composing the blanket.
